intro.title: The Mysterious Finding
intro.text:
╔═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║                    THE TRAVELER'S STONE                      ║
║                                                               ║
║  Young Rory trudges home from school, his backpack heavy     ║
║  with homework. As he cuts through the old forest path,      ║
║  something catches his eye...                                ║
║                                                               ║
║  There, nestled between the roots of an ancient oak tree,    ║
║  lies a perfectly round stone that glows with a soft blue    ║
║  light. It pulses gently, almost like a heartbeat.          ║
╚═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

The stone seems to call to you. What do you do?

examine_stone.title: A Closer Look
examine_stone.text:
You kneel and examine the stone carefully. It's perfectly spherical, 
about the size of a marble, glowing with swirling blue light.

Strange symbols are etched into its surface, shifting when you're not 
looking directly at them. The stone pulses brighter as you get closer.

read_symbols.title: Ancient Markings
read_symbols.text:
As you focus on the symbols, they glow brighter and shift before your eyes. 
The markings appear to be ancient script - one resembles a doorway, another 
a castle on an island.

The stone grows warmer in response to your attention.

memorize_symbols.title: Mysterious Knowledge
memorize_symbols.text:
You study the symbols carefully, committing them to memory. The markings 
seem to burn themselves into your mind - you'll remember them forever.

The stone pulses brighter, pleased by your attention.

[KNOWLEDGE GAINED: Ancient Symbols]

choices.text: Leave the stone and go home

ignore_stone.title: The Path Not Taken
ignore_stone.text:
You decide to leave the mysterious object alone. You hurry home, but can't 
shake the feeling you've made a terrible mistake.

That night you dream of adventures and magic kingdoms. You wake to find the 
stone on your nightstand, glowing softly.

Perhaps some destinies cannot be avoided...

persistent_stone.title: Destiny Calls
persistent_stone.text:
The stone seems determined to be noticed, appearing in impossible places 
throughout the day. Your parents can't see it at all.

Finally, exhausted by its persistence, you give in.

choices.text: Accept your fate and take the stone

pickup_stone.title: The Stone's Touch
pickup_stone.text:
Warmth spreads through your hand as you touch the stone. It pulses brighter, 
and you feel a strange tingling sensation.

The stone feels perfectly smooth and vibrates gently. You slip it into your 
pocket and hurry home.

choices.text: Show it to your parents first

show_parents.title: Parental Confusion
show_parents.text:
You rush to show your parents the stone, but they can't see it at all.
"Rory, there's nothing in your hands," your father says gently.

They're concerned about your mental health. The stone is invisible to everyone 
but you, making it even more mysterious.

choices.text: Go to your room with the stone
Try to convince them it's real

convince_parents.title: Failed Explanation
convince_parents.text:
You spend ten minutes trying to convince them, but they suggest you get 
some rest. Frustrated but realizing it's hopeless, you head to your room.

The stone seems to pulse with understanding.

room_scene.title: In Your Room
room_scene.text:
In your room, the stone glows brighter, casting blue shadows on the walls. 
You can't focus on homework - the stone seems to whisper wordlessly.

Before you know it, you're in bed holding it close.

stay_awake.title: Fighting Sleep
stay_awake.text:
You try to study the stone without sleeping, but its hypnotic warmth and 
pulsing light are irresistible. Despite your efforts, your eyelids grow heavy.

You can't resist any longer and drift off still holding the stone.

hide_stone.title: Safety First
hide_stone.text:
You wrap the stone carefully and hide it in your dresser. But you can't 
concentrate on homework - it calls to you from its hiding place.

After an hour, you retrieve it. Just holding it fills you with warmth and 
comfort. Before you know it, you're in bed with it.

stubborn_resistance.title: The Stone's Pull
stubborn_resistance.text:
You're determined to resist its influence, piling books on top of the drawer. 
But you toss and turn all night, dreaming of the stone calling to you.

At 3 AM, you give up and retrieve it. The moment you touch it, profound peace 
washes over you.

choices.text: Let the stone guide you to sleep
